      • sendRequest4ExternalAuthorizaton

        RequestResponse sendRequest4ExternalAuthorizaton(RequestDetail request,
                                                 java.util.List<EntitlementDetail> rolesToAdd,
                                                 java.util.List<EntitlementDetail> rolesToRemove,
                                                 java.util.List<EntitlementDetail> rolesToRenew,
                                                 UserDetail applicant,
                                                 UserDetail beneficiary,
                                                 java.lang.String realm)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Send request for external authorizaton. This method is used to send informal request generated with distinct list of roles jonied for operation (roles to add, roles to remove and to renew)
        Parameters:
        request - the request RequestDetail
        rolesToAdd - the list of EntitlementDetail to add
        rolesToRemove - the list of EntitlementDetail to remove
        rolesToRenew - the list of EntitlementDetail to renew
        applicant - the applicant UserDetail
        beneficiary - the beneficiary UserDetail
        Returns:
        the request response RequestResponse enum
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception
